mapper.select: INSERT INTO T3_CBRD VALUES (NULL, #{id}, #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{ctitle}, #{ccont}, 0, NOW(), NULL, 'N', 0)
mapper.delete: UPDATE T3_CBRD SET DELYN = 'Y', UDATE = NOW() WHERE CBNO = #{cbno}
mapper.select: SELECT B.CBNO, B.ID, CATE1, CATE2, CTITLE, CCONT, B.CDATE, B.UDATE, HITS, D1.CINFO AS CATE1NAME, D2.CINFO AS CATE2NAME, IFNULL(COMMCNT,0) AS COMMCNT FROM T3_CBRD B INNER JOIN T3_DESC D1 ON B.CATE1 = D1.CNUM INNER JOIN T3_DESC D2 ON B.CATE2 = D2.CNUM LEFT JOIN (SELECT CBNO, COUNT(CNO) AS COMMCNT FROM T3_CMRE GROUP BY CBNO) C1 ON B.CBNO = C1.CBNO WHERE B.CBNO = #{cbno}
mapper.update: UPDATE T3_CBRD SET CTITLE = #{ctitle}, CCONT = #{ccont}, CATE1 = #{cate1}, CATE2 = #{cate2}, UDATE = NOW() WHERE CBNO = #{cbno}
UPDATE T3_CBRD SET HITS = HITS + 1 WHERE CBNO = #{cbno}
mapper.select: SELECT CNUM, CINFO FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="CATE1" || CID="CATE2"
SELECT CNUM, CINFO FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="CATE1"
SELECT CNUM, CINFO, PCOMM1 FROM T3_DESC WHERE CID="CATE2" AND PCOMM1=#{pcomm1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T3_CMRE VALUES (NULL, NULL, #{cbno}, #{id}, #{conte}, NULL, NOW(), NULL, 0, 0, #{comms}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT CNO, CBNO, C.ID, U.NICK AS NICK, CONTE, RECONTE, C.CDATE, C.UDATE, SHOWYN, DELYN, RECNO FROM T3_CMRE C INNER JOIN T3_USER U ON C.ID = U.ID WHERE CBNO = #{cbno} ORDER BY CDATE ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE T3_CMRE SET DELYN = 'Y', UDATE = NOW() WHERE CNO = #{cno}
UPDATE T3_CMRE SET CONTE = #{conte}, UDATE = NOW() WHERE CNO = #{cno}
